description: Akam is an AI-powered EdTech platform that guides students from school to university. With 150K+ users and 200K+ downloads, Akam helps students discover their best-fit major through psychology-based tests, explore matching universities, take entrance mock exams, and apply ‚Äî all in one place. The platform combines gamification, AI tracking, subject-based communities, and personalized courses, making learning both effective and engaging. Akam also supports universities through targeted lead generation and direct application integration.

name: Karmon AI
short_description: Karmon AI: Your universal tool for budgeting, expense tracking, and loan management with AI-powered insights.
description: Karmon AI is a modern personal finance management app tailored for users in emerging markets, starting with Uzbekistan. It helps individuals track income, expenses, and budgets across cash and bank accounts (Uzcard, HUMO, Visa), with real-time sync and AI-powered categorization. Users can log transactions manually or through voice, images, or receipts using our Telegram bot or Karmon Eye OCR tool. The app also offers smart budgeting tools, shared finance management, peer-to-peer loan tracking with reminders, goal setting, and an Islamic Zakat calculator. With mobile and web access, Karmon AI delivers a secure, localized, and intelligent solution for everyday money management.

name: Speaklish
description: Speaklish is an AI-powered IELTS speaking evaluator that helps students improve their English speaking skills by providing in-depth speech analysis and personalized feedback. The platform aims to offer affordable and accessible practice for the IELTS speaking exam, utilizing AI to evaluate speaking skills, enhance fluency, and build confidence. Speaklish provides tailored skill development plans, practice speaking sessions, and interactive workshops. It has a user base of over 50,000 organic users. Speaklish won 2nd place in the President Tech Awards, receiving $50,000 in the AI in EdTech field and received $15,000 from the WERISE accelerator. The company also has investments from Google Startups. Speaklish is led by Boburjon Mardonov (CTO) and Jasmina Anorova (CPO), and is expanding throughout Uzbekistan, partnering with different schools, with plans to expand into the MENA and EU markets.

With features like real-time tracking, financial analytics, and automated load recommendations, Diip.uz simplifies logistics operations, enhances trust, and maximizes profitability.

We bridge the gap between fragmented markets, offering verified users, seamless communication, and dynamic pricing systems. By leveraging cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights, Diip.uz delivers efficiency, transparency, and scalability for the logistics industry across Central Asia and beyond.

name: Jobster.hr
description: Jobster.hr is an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) tailored for efficient recruitment, excels in simplifying bulk and targeted hiring for employers. It automates processes like job posting, resume screening, testing, and interview scheduling. Already, 70+ companies trust Jobster as their primary ATS, a testament to its effectiveness in streamlining recruitment.

name: EduCompass
description:
EduCompas is an innovative educational platform designed to simplify the search and selection of educational courses. The project's goal is to help students and learners quickly find suitable courses in educational centers, compare them, and enroll in training. The platform allows users to search for courses by category, filter by location and other criteria, and receive personalized recommendations based on their knowledge level.

With EduCompas, educational centers can promote their courses, effectively engage with potential students, and increase enrollments. Centers can manage their courses, add branches, publish events, and update information about available spots. This simplifies the course search process for students and helps educational institutions reach their target audience.

The system includes a testing module that allows users to determine their current knowledge level and receive course recommendations accordingly. The platform also supports event management, enabling educational centers to publish announcements about upcoming events and seminars.

EduCompas aims to create a unified space for interaction between educational institutions and learners, providing access to a full range of educational opportunities in one place. This makes the course search process more convenient and educational centers more accessible and visible to students.

name: Robosell
description:
Robosell is a platform for fast online business startup that combines all key tools in one solution.

With Robosell, entrepreneurs receive a Telegram bot, a website, and an admin panel for order automation, sales management, and operations control in just 1 day. We easily integrate with payment services, delivery, warehouse accounting and POS systems, making business processes convenient and transparent.

Why invest in Robosell?
- A unique solution for the growing market of Uzbekistan and, in the future, the entire CIS, where digitalization is becoming critically important for small and medium-sized businesses.
- Rapid growth: more than 100+ active customers, scalable architecture and plans to enter international markets.
- Functional expansion: the introduction of artificial intelligence and new integrations that increase efficiency and customer sales.

Robosell is a game‚Äîchanging tool for entrepreneurs, making the transition online simple and affordable, and business management efficient and profitable.

name: Paylov
description:
Paylov is a fintech startup founded in 2022 by a financier and an IT architect with the aim of creating a universal financial ecosystem "for their own". In 2022, the company attracted investments from angel investors from South Korea, and launched its operations in December 2023. After just 8 months, the startup reached break-even and attracted more than 100 B2B clients. In 2024, the company transformed into a joint-stock company and issued shares, continuing to actively develop the market.

Pavlov is building an ecosystem that unites:

Comprehensive solutions for payments and cryptocurrencies.
Investment instruments and P2P payments.
Scoring and debt collection systems.
We create innovative products that simplify financial transactions for users and businesses, and strive to become a leader in the digital finance market. Invest in the future with Pavlov!

F-Pharmacy - automation of all internal pharmacy processes, from warehouse and shelves to cache machine. 
F-Summary - a marketplace between distributors and pharmacies for order fulfillment.
ArzonApteka - B2C applications for searching and ordering medicines.
DATFO - analytics platform for manufacturers with predictive models and pharma market information.

We are the market leader in Uzbekistan with 60% coverage (7000+ pharmacies) and 3 million users, and already have 200+ pharmacy customers in UAE.

description: Cradle Vision Tech is an AI-powered video analytics startup that delivers end-to-end security, real-time insights, and operational efficiencies. Their product lines address a wide range of sectors‚Äîincluding government (for attendance tracking and defense), retail (customer analytics), enterprise APIs (facial recognition and integration), and consumer security (smart home solutions). By bundling high-accuracy computer vision software with hardware, Cradle Vision Tech simplifies adoption and accelerates ROI for its clients. Led by a team of experienced engineers and AI researchers, the company has established public-sector pilot projects and is poised for global expansion across Central Asia, MENA, and Europe. With a scalable cloud-based infrastructure and proven governmental partnerships, Cradle Vision Tech is well-positioned to capture the growing market for intelligent video analytics.

name: findecor.io
short_description: AI-powered platform that helps young homeowners find home decor from online and offline stores. It analyzes room photos to suggest items that match their style, budget, and space effortlessly.
description:
Findecor is an AI-powered e-commerce platform that helps young homeowners find and purchase home decor from both online and offline stores.
The Problem
Browsing endless product lists from e-commerce platforms or offline stores makes home decor shopping time-consuming and overwhelming. Finding the perfect match for your style, budget, and space requires too much effort.
Our Solution
Findecor simplifies the process by analyzing your room photos and instantly suggesting the best decor that fits your style and budget. Our AI-driven platform connects you with products from both online and nearby stores, reducing search time and making shopping effortless.
With limitless chat support from our AI agent, you can get personalized recommendations, styling tips, and product suggestions‚Äîensuring you find the perfect home decor with ease.

scalable for startups and large enterprises

name: Insight
description:
Insight is an online research panel based on the telegram web app. This is a special platform that allows you to collect and process information received by redirecting (api) data from a bot in a telegram messenger or a web resource.
It is designed to conduct quantitative online surveys of any complexity. It has been operating in our market since 2023. It is planned to expand the functionality and expand into the global market.

name: AL-JABR EDU
short_description: AI-JABR EDU is an AI-powered mathematics learning platform offering personalized courses. Make mathematics accessible and engaging.
description:
Startup Description: AL-JABR EDU
AL-JABR EDU is an interactive SaaS platform designed to make mathematics education engaging, effective, and personalized for schoolchildren.  Our mission is to provide a convenient technological tool that helps students independently manage the learning process and enhance their motivation.


Our platform is equipped with an adaptive diagnostic system to assess the student's initial knowledge level, which then automatically generates a personalized curriculum for daily tasks and exercises.  To maintain user engagement, we have integrated a reliable gamification mechanism with a rating, rewards, and cashback incentive system.  The platform also includes a complete library of content with thousands of mathematical problems and video lessons for all grades.



Our business model is based on a SaaS subscription that provides premium features for both individual users (B2C) and educational partners such as tutoring centers and schools (B2B).  Based in Uzbekistan, we focus on growth, planning to export our services to the markets of Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, and Tajikistan.

name: DreamSat
description:
DreamSat is an innovative educational initiative dedicated to inspiring and equipping the next generation of engineers and space enthusiasts in Uzbekistan. The project focuses on hands-on learning in satellite technology, enabling students to design, build, and launch CubeSats and other space-related systems.  

Through DreamSat, participants gain practical experience in aerospace engineering, electronics, programming, and mission planning, fostering a deeper understanding of space exploration. By collaborating with universities, research institutions, and industry leaders, DreamSat aims to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and real-world applications, empowering students to contribute to Uzbekistan‚Äôs growing space sector.  

DreamSat is more than just a project‚Äîit is a movement to cultivate scientific curiosity, technological innovation, and a passion for space among young minds. üöÄ

Azma Finance is an accounting automation platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses. We simplify the processes of calculating taxes, reporting, and managing financial documents through a convenient Telegram bot interface, web applications, and a mini-application for Telegram & Click.
‚†Ä
Our goal is to make accounting accessible and automated, allowing business owners to focus on the growth of their companies. We help entrepreneurs reduce their time for financial processes, minimize errors, and remain fully secure in tax and financial matters.
‚†Ä
Through integration with platforms like Click and Yandex Go, as well as through API, we expand user capabilities by offering flexible solutions for small businesses, startups, and freelancers.

name: LUMID AI
short_description: Lumid AI delivers ready-to-use AI agents that eliminate repetitive work so your team can focus on what matters.
description:
The Problem We're Solving
Businesses waste countless hours on repetitive tasks like resume screening, customer support, and data entry. These manual processes are error-prone, time-consuming, and prevent teams from focusing on strategic work.

Our Solution
Lumid AI's pre-built agents automate these workflows with advanced AI, reducing operational costs by up to 60% while improving accuracy and consistency. Our agents work 24/7, learning and adapting to your specific needs.

name: Growz
description: Growz is a cutting-edge digital platform revolutionizing agriculture for smallholder farmers. By combining AI-powered advisory tools, real-time pest and disease diagnostics, and an integrated marketplace, Growz empowers farmers to optimize crop management, reduce waste, and improve yields. Designed with sustainability at its core, the platform provides personalized recommendations, market and finance access, and digital training, ensuring farmers thrive in a changing agricultural landscape. With a multidisciplinary team of over 20 experts, Growz is shaping the future of farming through its digital transformation.

With Yemak, we don‚Äôt just deliver food‚Äîwe deliver convenience and save your valuable time.

üåç Expanding Soon! Bringing quality food delivery to more locations.

Easy Clean is an innovative platform that automates and simplifies the process of providing cleaning services. We create a convenient digital solution that connects clients with professional cleaners, ensuring high-quality cleaning, transparent processes, and time savings.

Our startup leverages modern technologies, including SaaS and artificial intelligence, to optimize routes, manage orders, and enhance the efficiency of cleaners. Easy Clean is your reliable assistant, making cleaning accessible, fast, and as comfortable as possible.

name: MyID
short_description: MyID Vision is a biometric system that uses AI for secure identity verification through palm or face scans, providing fast, password-free access in banking, telecom, and public services.
description:
MyID is a pioneering startup focused on transforming identity verification and authentication. By leveraging cutting-edge computer vision and AI algorithms, MyID offers secure and contactless biometric solutions - such as palm or facial recognition - to streamline and enhance user authentication across various sectors.

Solution Overview:
	‚Ä¢ Biometric Authentication: Uses palm or facial recognition with advanced AI for quick and secure identity verification, eliminating the need for passwords or physical IDs.
	‚Ä¢ Easy Integration: Provides flexible APIs and SDKs that can be seamlessly integrated into existing systems across banking, telecommunications, healthcare, e-government, and other sectors.
	‚Ä¢ Scalable Architecture: Designed to support high traffic environments and large user bases, making it ideal for enterprise-level deployments.
	‚Ä¢ Contactless Experience: Reduces physical touchpoints and associated hygiene or fraud risks, increasing user trust and satisfaction.

description: Mohirdev is Central Asia‚Äôs leading online IT education platform, offering industry-relevant bootcamps in software development, AI, DevOps, and more. Founded in 2021 in Tashkent, Mohirdev empowers learners through expert-led instruction, AI-powered personalization, and lifetime access to high-quality content. Our mission is to ignite the IT potential in every learner and prepare them for successful, future-proof careers. With 18 bootcamps and a growing library of short courses, we serve a wide range of learners‚Äîfrom students to career changers. Recognized as Uzbekistan‚Äôs top IT education provider based on graduate employment, we focus on student outcomes, innovation, and community. Our platform enables practical skill development, mentorship, and job placement support, making Mohirdev the go-to destination for aspiring tech professionals across the region

name: BrailleRecognition
description:
AI-powered Braille Translator app!
BrailleRecognition is designed to help educators, parents, and caregivers easily translate Braille into readable text. Using your phone's camera, the app quickly scans and converts Braille from books, notes, or labels into plain text.

name: UzWorks
short_description: For find job and worker.
description: A project aimed at reducing unemployment in Uzbekistan and facilitating communication between workers and employers.

name: Urbo
short_description: Find, compare, and finance real estate in one place
description:
Urbo is an online platform for real estate search in Uzbekistan. We aggregate listings for new developments, secondary market properties, rentals, and commercial real estate, providing users with detailed information, price analytics, and convenient search tools.
For developers, realtors, and property owners, Urbo offers seamless listing management, property promotion, and market insights. Our future plans include bank integrations for mortgage applications, renovation services, investment consulting, and digital notary transactions.

description: Astracode is an AI-driven learning platform offering courses in Web Development, Mobile Development, QA, Project Management, and Artificial Intelligence. With no human instructors, AI adapts to each student‚Äôs progress, ensuring personalized and effective learning.

Tomorrow is an innovative game development startup dedicated to creating immersive, emotionally oriented experiences that blur the line between reality and imagination. At the center of tomorrow lies the task of exploring deep stories, futuristic worlds, and bold choices that determine the player's journey.

Build tomorrow. Change everything.

name: Applicant.uz
short_description: Applicant is a multifunctional platform that allows students to apply to any university, scholarship, or grant globally from single & unique platform.
description: Applicant is an all-in-one platform that simplifies the global education application process for students at all levels, including community colleges, universities, bachelor's, master's, PhD programs, and more. With a unified profile system, users can apply to multiple universities, scholarships, and grants without leaving the platform. Multilingual support, automatic document translation, and real-time tracking ensure a seamless experience, eliminating the need for external research. Applicant provides a fully integrated solution where students can discover, compare, and apply to educational institutions worldwide in one place, making studying abroad more accessible and efficient than ever.

name: Inter AI
description: Inter AI - is a tool that helps HR specialists filter and interview candidates.

name: Twinkle Uzbekistan
short_description: Twinkle is a monetization platform for active media content creators.
description: Twinkle is a monetization platform exclusively for creators who produce intellectual, culturally rich, and meaningful content. We provide only selected creators with the opportunity to transform their media products into real value. With Twinkle, creators can earn revenue through donations, subscriptions, and sponsorships while continuing to produce high-quality content that educates, inspires, and adds value to their audience.

name: GREEN PIXEL
description:
Green Pixel is an innovative solution designed for comprehensive management and monitoring of forest ecosystems.
Utilizing artificial intelligence and satellite data, it provides effective tools for monitoring territories in real-time.
Green Pixel helps to:
   - Preserve natural resources.
   - Prevent illegal logging and ecosystem degradation.
   - Ensure sustainable management of trees.

Allows passengers on the plane to immerse themselves in the history and culture of the country during the flight. The game also provides tourists with various bonuses to local establishments, in the form of discounts, coupons, etc.

name: Yalfin
short_description: Effortless Accounting, Powered by AI
description:
Yalfin is an accounting platform based on artificial intelligence, primarily designed for simplicity and ease of use. This directly resolves the frustration and time costs associated with complex, traditional accounting software, especially for small and medium-sized enterprises.

Our main task is to simplify financial management, allowing business owners and accountants to focus on growth and strategic concepts instead of getting stuck in manual data entry, vertical learning curves, and inconvenient interfaces.

name: Push30

description:
"Push 30" is a provider of corporate benefits that provides its clients with unlimited access to more than 150 fitness centers in Baku and Tashkent.

Use your membership to gain access to more than 100 partners in our network.
There are no restrictions on entering sports centers and studios.
A diverse selection of fitness centers, such as gyms, swimming pools, pilates, yoga, and much more
Various sports competitions to improve and make your fitness life brighter

short_description: A mobile application for small-to-mid sized businesses to manage their financial transactions.
description: A mobile application for small-to-mid sized businesses to manage their financial transactions.

name: Next KPI
description: Next KPI is a modern system designed to effectively manage scientific and educational processes in educational institutions. This system allows for automated monitoring, analysis, and ranking of scientific achievements and indicators of universities. It is integrated with systems such as Web of Science, Scopus, and HEMIS, allowing for the evaluation of teachers' articles, scientific works, and lesson quality. Next KPI provides users with statistical data in the form of graphs and reports, generates automatic recommendations based on KPI indicators, and facilitates planning. This system helps to effectively manage time and resources by automating educational processes and simplifying management.

name: StudyGO
short_description: A smart educational platform connecting top experts with learners through immersive, engaging, and multilingual courses.
description: StudyGO is a modern educational platform offering interactive, gamified, and personalized learning experiences. We connect the best local experts with students across various subjects‚Äîfrom IELTS to biology to business‚Äîthrough online video courses,  and real-time consultations. Available in Uzbek, Russian, and English, StudyGO empowers learners with high-quality content and practical skills while helping experts earn passive income and grow their audience.

name: Human AI
short_description: Human AI creates real-time talking, photorealistic AI avatars. They will work as teachers, advertisers, or virtual interlocutors and support the Uzbek language.
description: Human AI is a startup project specializing in creating photorealistic AI avatars that work in real time. They repeat lip movements, facial expressions, and head movements based on live speech. This technology is used in the fields of online education, customer service, virtual meetings, digital marketing, and the metaverse. Unlike existing solutions, our system also supports low latency, real-time, and the Uzbek language. The project is based on advanced AI models, speech synthesis, and WebRTC. The business model is based on SaaS, API, and corporate licenses. This technology aims to make communication more lively and natural through digital people.

name: SayyohAI
short_description: TouristAI is an innovative platform that recommends places to tourists and communicates based on AI. It operates through a question-and-answer system and contributes to the digitalization of tourism.
description: TouristAI is an innovative platform based on artificial intelligence that provides tourists with site recommendations and answers their questions. AI makes travel more convenient by providing detailed information about historical monuments, hotels, transport, and local culture. TouristAI delivers reliable information to users quickly and accurately.

name: Ustozim
short_description: My teacher: Redefining Education with Next-Generation AI
description: We empower educational ecosystems with AI-driven personalization, advanced analytics for unmatched engagement and outcomes. We believe it's time to transform education forever. With AI at unprecedented power, our team is ready to set new standards in digital learning - creating engaging, scalable, and adaptive experiences that redefine how knowledge is delivered and consumed, much like building "TikTok for Education."

name: HETA
description:
Autonomous Electric Tractor Startup Plan

1. Project Overview
HETA is a driverless electric tractor project designed for smart agriculture. The tractor operates autonomously, performing tasks such as plowing, planting, and other fieldwork. It utilizes artificial intelligence and LiDAR technology to analyze the field and determine optimal movement.
2. Problem and Solution
Problem:
- Shortage of labor in agriculture
- Dependence on diesel fuel and harmful environmental emissions
- Low efficiency and high costs in farming

Solution:
- Reducing dependence on human labor through an autonomous electric tractor
- Lowering fuel costs by 60-80% by using electric power
- Enhancing efficiency through artificial intelligence
3. Market Analysis
Existing Market
- The global agricultural machinery market surpassed $200 billion in 2023.
- The market for electric and driverless agricultural machinery is rapidly growing.
- Demand for eco-friendly and smart agricultural technology is increasing in Uzbekistan and Central Asia.
Potential Customers
- Farming enterprises
- Large agricultural corporations
- Government and state programs
4. Technological Solution and Innovation
- Autonomous control: AI-powered navigation.
- LiDAR and sensors: Environmental scanning for safe movement.
- Electric-powered operation: Battery and solar energy support.
- IoT and remote control: Operation via smartphone or computer.
5. Business Model
- Primary revenue source: Selling or leasing tractors.
- Additional services: Maintenance and software updates.
- Partnerships: Collaborations with large agribusinesses and government entities.
6. Finance and Investment Requirements
Initial Expenses:
- R&D (Research and Development): $30,000
- Prototype development: $40,000
- Production and testing: $20,000
- Marketing and sales: $10,000
Total Investment Required: $100,000
 7. Team
- Project Leader: Turdiyev Akbarali
-Engineer: Tursunqulov Avazbek
-Software engineer: Yaxshiliqov Javlon
-Mechanic: Bektoshev Behroz
- Technical Engineers: Specialists in electrical engineering and software development
- Business Development Team: Responsible for investment and marketing strategy
 8. Development Stages
1. Prototype Development (0-6 months)
2. Testing and Certification (6-12 months)
3. Initial Sales and Investor Attraction (12-18 months)
4. Scaling and Mass Production (18+ months)
Conclusion
The HETA startup has the potential to revolutionize agriculture. By leveraging electric power, autonomous control, and smart technology, it can make farming operations more efficient and eco-friendly. With proper investment, the project can rapidly develop and secure its place in the market.

name: The Golden Horde: Survival
description: "The Golden Horde : Survival" is a medieval 3rd-person survival RPG with strategy elements, based on the historical events of Middle Asia. The game takes in the events of the 13th century, during the reign of the Mongol Empire in Central Asia.

name: FINQ
description: FINQ is an AI-powered loan management platform that simplifies and optimizes lending for both financial institutions and individuals. For banks and lenders, it enhances credit scoring, streamlines loan processing, and improves risk management through AI-driven automation. As a lending platform, FINQ also helps individuals access loans easily by connecting them with suitable financial institutions.

name: instateka-s
description: Instateka is a B2B platform for automating real estate transactions. We unite clients, banks and partners into a single ecosystem. The main project is to transfer the mortgage lending process online for professional real estate market participants.

name: ConnectaCRM
description: CRM platform for logistics in the USA

name: HomeFix
short_description: HomeFix is a tech-driven home services startup offering over 16 maintenance solutions for homes and offices, with on-demand and subscription plans, powered by a fully automated digital ecosystem.
description: HomeFix is an innovative home and office services startup providing over 16 specialized solutions, including plumbing, electrical work, smart home installations, and industrial equipment maintenance. The company operates through a fully automated digital ecosystem, ensuring seamless service management. HomeFix offers both on-demand and subscription-based services, catering to homeowners and businesses. Within its first four months, it generated $10,000 in revenue and is working to secure $500,000 in funding. To scale operations and qualify for IT Park residency, HomeFix is expanding into software implementation and customization. Led by Technical Manager Ikhtiyor, the startup leverages technology to optimize service efficiency, automate processes, and enhance customer experience, positioning itself as a leader in the home services industry.

name: ELBOZOR
description: Elbozor is a next-generation e-commerce classifieds service that makes it easy to sell and buy everything you need nearby

name: Donortop.uz
description: Donortop.uz is an online platform that makes it easy to find and contact blood donors in Uzbekistan. The project aims to provide prompt assistance to patients, eliminate difficulties in finding blood, and develop a culture of donation. Donors register and leave their information, and there is also an opportunity to search for and contact donors based on their needs.

name: Examy
description: Examy is a combination of AI powered IELTS mock and practice platfrom where users can take simulated IELTS tests and find out their scores within a minute. Examy, unlike other mock platforms, provides full report on the results, mistakes of the test taker along with comments on how to improve. Examy has helped over 10,000 students prepare for IELTS exam and achieve their desired scores.
